statements: UPDATE FacialRecognitionResults SET confidence_score = 0.8 WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE FacialRecognitionResults SET recognition_result = '{"match": true}' WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE FacialRecognitionResults SET recognition_result = '{"verified": true, "confidence": 0.95}', confidence_score = 0.95 WHERE user_id = 1234
UPDATE FacialRecognitionResults SET face_image = E'\x255044462d312e330a...', recognition_result = '{"verified": false}', date_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 5678
UPDATE face_recognition_results SET result = '{"status": "success"}', created_at = '2022-04-13 12:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE report_history SET reporter_name = 'John Doe', report_date = '2022-04-14' WHERE report_id = 5;
UPDATE face_recognition_results SET result = '{"success": true}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE report_history SET report_text = 'Suspicious behavior detected', reporter_name = 'James Doe' WHERE report_id = 5;
UPDATE facial_recognition_results SET recognition_score = 0.75 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE persons SET last_name = 'Doe', nationality = 'American' WHERE person_id = 2003;
UPDATE facial_recognition_results SET recognition_score = 0.95, image_path = '/path/to/image' WHERE id = 1234;
UPDATE persons SET nationality = 'American', first_name = 'John' WHERE person_id = 5678;
UPDATE FaceRecognitionResults SET image_url = 'new_image.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET full_name = 'John Doe', created_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE FaceRecognitionResults SET detection_result = '{"face_count": 5, "timestamp": "2022-08-01 13:45:00"}', created_at = '2022-08-01 13:45:00' WHERE id = 1001
UPDATE Users SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2001
UPDATE DetectedFaces SET confidence = 0.85 WHERE face_id = 123
UPDATE IdentifiedSubjects SET total_recognitions = 10, subject_name = 'John Doe' WHERE subject_id = 456
UPDATE FacialRecognitionResults SET subject_name = 'Alice', recognition_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE IdentifiedSubjects SET total_recognitions = total_recognitions + 1 WHERE subject_id = 5;
